O2.summary: Talk to Junlei about the Parts

description.S1: Go talk to Junlei to figure out what to do with the radiator parts you found.

blurb.B1: Return to Junlei to move on to the next step of repairing the radiators.
blurb.B2: Junlei asks the Stranger to take the elevator at the back of Engineering down to the machinery shaft and activate the terminal they find there.
blurb.B3: She warns them of a mantipillar infestation and advises that they go armed.

description.S1: Junlei told you to enter the maintenance shaft and help her install the new parts for the radiators.
description.S2: She warned you to go armed.

blurb.B2: It is populated with mantipillars and hostile automechanicals which must either be defeated or sneaked around to reach the required terminal.
blurb.B3: Activate the Fluid Circulation Pump Terminal and cycle the droplet pumps to fix the radiators and return the temperature on Groundbreaker to a more comfortable level.

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: You've returned - and in one piece. Color me impressed.

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: Captain. What can I do for you?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I got the parts for the radiators. What now?

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'll take those. I need you to head through the large door at the far end of engineering. Take the elevator down into the machinery shaft.

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: There's a terminal in the back. Activate it when I call over the ship's PA. And bring weapons. There's a slight mantipillar infestation.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll make my way down there.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I got your parts, why do I have to go to some maintenance shaft?

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: More than a few. Less than a hive. Nothing you can't handle.

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: We were salvaging parts from a ship. Turned out there were eggs inside. They got into the radiators, and here we are.

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: If every repair was a one-woman job, I wouldn't need an engineering team. As it is, my staff is busy keeping the station from melting down.

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: You can flip a switch for me, but you can't install these parts. Not quickly at least. Not on the first try. Able though you've proven to be.
